text:
@JoeBiden Trump supports police brutality, he did not ban choke holds,he calls protesters thugs and low life’s, he slows down Coronavirus testing, he supports statues that glorify slavery. It seems he no longer wants to be president.

WE NEED A LEADER WHO PROTECTS AND CARES FOR ALL PEOPLE.
